name: Google Calendar - Dark Theme
description: There are several userstyles to darken the google suite overall, but in my experience not much attention is paid to poor old Google Calendar. I constantly have this tool open, and its default whiteness is too much for my poor eyes to take. This style fixes that. The source SASS for this theme is available (with my other stylish themes) here.
additional_info: One issue I keep seeing pop up with this style is the top Google "Search Calendar" bar. Every so often, the class that controls the background color of that area will simply change. They have this really odd class scheme too, which makes it hard to understand. What this means for you as the user is that if you see this happen, you can either wait a few days for me to fix it (assuming that everyone gets the same change at the same time, and with a company as big as Google who knows), or if yours is different than mine for some reason, you can make a pull request in my repo here, or you can send me a message with the class name that you need added to the list. The list is currently the following. Note the odd, seemingly random pattern of letters. #gb .gb_ve, #gb .gb_re, #gb .gb_se, #gb .gb_ue, #gb .gb_wf, #gb .gb_we, #gb .gb_ye, #gb .gb_Ce, #gb .gb_Cf, #gb .gb_T, #gb .gb_Bf, #gb .gb_R, #gb .gb_ib, #gb .gb_gd

discussions.name: Great but doesn't work well with carbon eXtreme
